Class PopupWindow

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    • Method Detail

      • onInfoWindowClick

        public void onInfoWindowClick(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Called when the marker's info window is clicked.

        This is called on the Android UI thread.

        For this use case we simply want to show the popup window dialog.

        Specified by:
        onInfoWindowClick in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener
        Parameters:
        marker - The marker of the info window that was clicked.
